channel.title: Comments on: 4 Wheels Move the Body, 2 Wheels Move the Soul

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2010/06/4-wheels-move-the-body-2-wheels-move-the-soul/#comment-15068">Dan</a>.
Hey Dan, the Ducati is actually sold, I have an 08 CBR600RR like you now. Just waiting for next season to ride!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dan.

Hey Dan, the Ducati is actually sold, I have an 08 CBR600RR like you now. Just waiting for next season to ride!

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description:
Seeing as it's been over a year since this post, how are you? How's the bike?
inliner93@hotmail.com If you can't get a reply out of me here, dunno why but I'm interested. I've got an 07 CBR 600.
item.content:encoded:
Seeing as it’s been over a year since this post, how are you? How’s the bike?

inliner93@hotmail.com If you can’t get a reply out of me here, dunno why but I’m interested. I’ve got an 07 CBR 600.

item.title: By: Wang
item.dc:creator: Wang
item.description: I get the same feeling when I mountain bike...interesting. hahaha
item.content:encoded: I get the same feeling when I mountain bike…interesting. hahaha
